Objective: Verify the ability to Log out using My account dropdown
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click on My Account and Click Login
2) Enter valid values in required fields and Click continue
3) Click logout in My Account drop down (ER-01)
4) Click continue in Log out screen (ER-02)
Expected Result:
1) The user should be Logged out
2) The user should be taken to HomePage

Objective: Verify the ability to Log out using right column options
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click on My Account and Click Login
2) Enter valid values in required fields and Click continue
3) Click My Account in My Account dropdown
4) Click Log out in right column options (ER-01)
5) Click continue in Log out screen (ER-02)
Expected Result:
1) The user should be Logged out
2) The user should be taken to HomePage

Objective: Verify clicking Back button does not logout user
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click on My Account and Click Login
2) Enter valid values in required fields and Click continue
3) Click back button in browser (ER-01)
Expected Result: 1) The User should not get Logged out

Objective: Verify the clicking Back button after log out does not log in again
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click on My Account and Click Login
2) Enter valid values in required fields and Click continue
3) Log out
4) Click back button in browser (ER-01)
Expected Result: 1) The User should not get Logged in

Objective: Verify log out button is shown in My Account dropdown after Log in
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click on My Account and Click Login
2) Enter valid values in required fields and Click continue
3) Click My Account Dropdown (ER-01)
4) Click My Account option and observe right column (ER-01)
Expected Result: 1) The Log out option should be shown

Objective: Verify logout button is not visible before Login
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click My Account Dropdown (ER-01)
2) Click Login option and observe right column (ER-01)
Expected Result: 1) The Log out option should not be shown

Objective: Verify the UI of Logout page
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click on My Account and Click Login
2) Enter valid values in required fields and Click continue
3) Click logout in My Account drop down (ER-01)
Expected Result: 1) The UI should be as per the requirement

Objective: Verify the logout functionality in different environments
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click on My Account and Click Login
2) Enter valid values in required fields and Click continue
3) Click logout in My Account drop down
4) Click continue in Log out screen (ER-01)
5) Repeat from Step-1 in other supported environments
Expected Result: 1) The User should be able to logout in other supported environments
